0: They helped make my Chicago trip a great experience
We love Chicago and will be back but will NEVER STAY HERE AGAINI am writing this at 1AM as my family can not sleep
Good place to stay for a city trip
I highly recommend this hotel for any family trip
Thank you so much Jef for your help and info on vacation information
This hotel was family friendly and we all felt welcome and comfortable
The hotel is within walking distance to Navy Pier and Michigan Avenue which made it very convenient for this trip
Outdoor pool was perfect for a tired teenager to sleep beside
1: This left our group with no where to meet
I am just glad that I as by myself on a 2day business trip and not with my wife on a Chicago vacation in that case I would have needed to move to another hotel
Least expensive hotel in area of business trip was ok room smelled funny due to water leak but was otherwise nice staff were very friendly and helpful
A fraternity group was partying from 1 to 3 in the morning providing the external noise
The next day we used Lfyt and paid a further distance I might add 13 round trip with three people
As we were on holiday we were waking late but the drilling and noise started around 8 830 am every morning we were there and could not sleep through it
The guests ended up being another volleyball family who booked on Expedia
Sleep quality is good but king room could use another comfy chair my spouse and I had to trade off sitting on the bed desk chair or the one comfy chair
There seemed to be a lack of security and we saw what looked like a potential problem when a group of unregistered guests entered the hotel and hassled the desk clerk
We had to leave Sunday morning because of a death in the family
